dem2vola module¶

Usage ../dem2vola.py <filename> <treedepth>

THIS PARSER IS NOT COMPLETED.

based on very old code .

dem2vola.main(filestring, depth)¶

Read the file, build the tree. Write a Binary.

dem2vola.parse_grid_data(filename, header, lasout=False)¶

Turning the grid into points for standardised interface.

dem2vola.parse_grid_header(filename)¶

Read ESRI Grid format point data and return header and points.
